website_summaries.verdict: Fantastic machine for all hard surface (even wood and laminate flooring). Simple design means this will last a long time.
pros: Simplicity of machine leads to durability
powerful enough for most home applications

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 uses. Called Oreck for repair info since it was still within 1 year warranty, they advised to take to Oreck store which I did and they refuse to work on any machine bought through Amazon, regardless if it says from Oreck direct or not. Mine said new. Watch also that it does not say open box which will be another reason they use not to fix stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LaLuna

customer_reviews.title: Smokin!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for just over 1 year. Last night was the second time I've needed to use it. Worked great for aroumd 10 minutes and started smoking. Now the this is completely dead. Shame something made by Oreck at this price tag woyld fail so miserably!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking and overheating with less than 4 hours of light use at home.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working with less than 4 hours of light use at home. Watch video...shows me turning on unit and then machine starts smoking with no pressure applied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Santana

customer_reviews.title: Product obviously not even checked before mailed out to new consumer
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with looks of product . My scrubber arrived obviously used. Old paint “ from someone’s hands “ on handle. Box padding torn and useless. Last buyers name and info on paper work in box . It was obviously returned without being checked and reviewed! One picture doesn’t show usage
customer_reviews.author: MoRo

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase if you plan to maintain your hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I used this orbiter when I had to clean and refresh the hardwood floors in my new home. I had a limited amount of time and a large area to complete. The machine works very well! Highly recommended. I used a sheepskin pad to buff the floors after applying Bona Refresh. I have subsequently used the orbiter with a 3M screen to sand a hardwood floor. It worked well in this function also. It is very easy to use and the pads are relatively inexpensive. This machine is a worthwhile investment if you plan to maintain your hardwood floors yourself.
customer_reviews.author: ntf

customer_reviews.title: Burned out on 2nd use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April and used it once and it worked great, but today I tried to use it for the second time. While using it, flames and black smoke poured out of the top. It's too late now to return it to Amazon, so I'm out several hundred dollars, which I've invested in the machine, attachments, and supplies. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Shorted and caught fire
customer_reviews.text: Was good for a year, then started smoking and puff fire of 🔥 dead
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Used for less than an hour and burned out
customer_reviews.text: The product is not durable. I used in twice on light cleaning floors. I smoked and stopped after the first 30 minutes. I tried again a week later, the same thing happened. After letting it rest, it is DOA. I expected better from Oreck as I have a couple of Oreck vacuum cleaners that work great. But I got a dud. Unfortunately, any repair people for Oreck is almost 100 miles away so if you get a dud, you are stuck with no way to get it looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Brehan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July and like some other reviews it began to smoke!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine.
customer_reviews.text: This a great little machine. It does not do the same job as my 17” monster rotary machine does, but it is great to get into small spaces - like in small bathrooms and closets. I’ve used it on tile and grout, carpet and strip/wax. The cons: there is only a 1 year warranty on this unit, where the residential unit has a 5 year warranty on the motor. My motor is smoking after only using this a handful of times (6-10 times in 2 1/2 years) and I will have to replace the motor or buy a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: BingBangBow

customer_reviews.title: THIS MACHINE IS MISREPRESENTED
customer_reviews.text: Oreck and Amazon has to know there is a problem with this machine. The motors are burning up after about 2 uses. This machine should be taken off of the market because of fire hazards. Also, anyone who purchased one should be reimbursed by Amazon and Oreck. It is a fire hazard but they continue to sell them.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome machine. Sanding my unfinished hardwood is like a charm. It is heavy a d puts enough pressure on the pads but very balanced and easy to control. Took me two hours sanding living room and the machine did well.
customer_reviews.author: Torsten S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Machine, Professional Grade
customer_reviews.text: We previously rented this machine, about twice a year, from our local Oreck dealer. We found it to be more convenient and cost effective to buy one for ourselves. We wax and polish our hard wood floors every couple of months. I have also used this machine with a sanding screen, to refinish floors. It won’t sand out major damage, but it will take down the surface scratches and prep the floor for New polyurethaning. The various cleaning attachments make this a truly multi purpose tool. The Machine itself is rock solid quality, quiet and smooth. I will gladly pay this price for a quality, long lasting tool.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to steer, light.
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked n used the machine 2 days ago. Amazing. I was concern about the weight n ability to maneuver, since I have bad back problems. After cleaning my family room 20x20 n my kitchen 15x 17 no back pain at all. It steer super easy n pretty much on its own. My tiles are white with a slight Gray shadow, but they're beautiful. I'm ordering the buffer pad so I can seal n polish them. I don't know how many years it will last but the one I had i inherit from my mom. We used it when I was 15 n I'm now 65 so figured. Lol. Great machine
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Padin

customer_reviews.title: Smoking (not in a good way) after less than 60 days!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for small business use. We use it rarely and purchased it 2 months ago. It is now making a weird noise and smoking as in about to be on fire. The warranty is not in affect because we are a commercial use. (But we have only used it 4 times. There is no way to contact the seller to have them make this right. Our last buffer which we bought used lasted for 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: mj80AW

customer_reviews.title: awesome thing for doing the floors in my rentals
customer_reviews.text: awesome thing for doing the floors in my rentals, i had to invest in microfiber mops to clean up all of the dirty water this produced but the floors look great. some learning curve for which pads are right for tile with grout .... go with blue, green is too squishy and orange is too firm.
customer_reviews.author: T Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buffer
customer_reviews.text: This buffer works as described, arrived on time, and if needed I would purchase from this seller again. I purchased some additional brushes and pads to use with my buffer along with a liquid cleaner product to remove grout haze from porcelain tile. I wish that I had purchased this machine much sooner. I have reviewed several videos on YouTube on use of the Oreck which have been very helpful. I am looking forward to using this machine on carpet along with the dry cleaning product and proper bonnet that professional cleaning did not remove all of the stains.
customer_reviews.author: cchunterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No chiropractor necessary.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after renting a floor polisher from a local hardware store. The renal one was heavy, hard to control & made enough noise to shake the neighborhood. The Oreck is very light in comparison, can be controlled with one hand and could be used as white noise. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gasman

customer_reviews.title: Dude - my new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Have a combination of sealed hardwood, natural stone tile, ceramic tile, brick and concrete surfaces. Got this machine and a big box of every attachment I could find - brushes, scrubbers, pads, buffers, etc. Used on multiple surfaces and loved it. It gets into tight spaces better than I imagined - like between toilets and wall. It does a great job on every surface and is like a mini-me version of the ones pro's use in big office buildings. It is also fairly light weight and relatively quiet. I don't have a life outside work and the house, so I'll say it - can't wait to use my new found toy again this week end.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial enough to get the job done while easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I am positively giddy over this floor cleaner machine. I like a really clean floor, and therefore I scrub my linoleum floors on my hands and knees with a scrub brush. My knees are getting bad, and I decided it was time to spend the money for a decent machine. WOW. It is heavy enough that you don't have to lean on it to get into textured floors and yet very light to operate. It does a fabulous job. My floor is now as clean as it was the day it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslee C.

customer_reviews.title: Saved me 2 days and about $1500!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased!! Light travertine floor and grout with 3 English Mastiffs indoors so much wear and tear. I used Rejuvenate deep grout cleaner then Stone Pro Polish Pro followed by sealer. I used the boar hair brush and white polish pads. It took me about 11 hours from vacuuming to sealing. I paid about $2000 last time I had a professional come clean and polish these floors. These before and after photos don't do it justice due to the lighting but we are very happy with the results!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Had this for almost 3 years but it was used only 2-3 times per year. Loved it-we have wood floors that I had to clean by hand; using this machine made it so much easier. Also used it on our tile flooring and as a buffer-absolutely loved the versatility of it. Until it went up in smoke... For the number of uses we got out of this, I would expect more. It was not used extensively and as stated, AT MOST, 3 times per year, so total number of uses was maybe 9. If this was "commercial" grade, it was very low grade. Disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: aljarn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The scrubber worked 4 times with light use then quit. Oreck will not honor the warranty. DO NOT BUY AT ANY COST!!!
customer_reviews.author: BerryPatchWest

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first BUT
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few weeks. Motor is now smoking (horrible smell) after short use. Not sure where to go next. I also bought lots of accessories which may be useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Started smoking before we ever finished using it the first time. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it has made my life better
customer_reviews.text: i use this for a cleaning account and it has perfectly replaced and out done a giant 50 pound machine that had tried to kill me several times. this oreck is very light. its gets into corners really good, and is very easy to control (even with one hand!) The pads are easy to change.. I am very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Casey Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for professional tile and grout cleaning
customer_reviews.text: We are a professional tile and grout cleaning company and I bought one of these to try out. The big floor machines are just a pain to load and unload. This machine is ideal size and the orbiting motion really allows the bristles to stay in the grout lines longer for better agitation. It actually works better than the big commercial floor buffers/scrubbers.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Moore

customer_reviews.title: I spent a lot of time researching the best tool to scrub my textured vinyl plank floors and ...
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching the best tool to scrub my textured vinyl plank floors and tile. I ended up buying the Oreck orbiter. It’s light enough for a small woman to use and it does a superb job. Nothing else, other than hand scrubbing, which is exhausting, got my textured vinyl planks clean. I use it with deluded Pine-Sol and it’s amazing. The brown multi-purpose brush works the best and cleans the tile grout really well. Love this product. Lent it to my son and it worked magnificently on his vinyl plank textured floors as well. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Smooth machine
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this machine. It more than pays for itself. Just wish all the floor attachments would come with it. I give it a 4 star instead of 5 because it needs to have a way to lock the handle. If left unattended the handle can fall and do some damage to a wall or whatever is under it. Other than that it’s a smooth running machine and very quiet. Thumbs UP!
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful floor cleaner for tile
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing floor cleaner. My grout and porcelain tile is 15 years old. With 3 cats and lots of dusty litter it was filthy. I would try to hand scrub small sections at a time but could never seem to get it all done because it took forever. I used this along with Zep grout cleaner, my floor mate and microfiber mop to rinse. It is rather heavy to move from area to area, but probably needs the weight to provide pressure to clean. While running it's easy to maneuver and very easy to use. I used the green scrubbing brush, which was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. DeGuelle

customer_reviews.title: Risk paid off so far
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, the reviews of it breaking down quickly and the hassle to get it fixed had me very hesitant to buy this. But so far it has done it's job. You do need to buy the cleaning pack with the cleaning supplies and brushes. Make sure you apply the white pad centered the first time, it's on there solid and hard to get off without fear of ripping it. The 3-in-1 feature and the price for this type of cleaner is what got me to buy the product and roll the dice. so far it is working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn McCarroll

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. What a quality product. We've put it through the mill and give it 5 starts all day long! My stripped down wood floors now look gorgeous, my tile floors are clean clean clean. Quiet, smooth, quality. Does NOT come with pass, those are sold separately, but comes with the ring that holds them. With the money to be sure!
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great for buffing, polishing and scrubbing. Not so great for sanding and refinishing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for both buffing/polishing and sanding. Although the former is easy with the right pads, the machine is useless for sanding. There were things I was able to remove with a light scratch of my fingernail that this thing couldn’t remove using red, black, grey or brown pads. I figured if it weighed about twice what it currently does, it should be enough pressure to get the job done. However, attempting to add weight to any machine with a motor like this is just asking to have it prematurely burn out. If you’re going to sand or remove polyurethane, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. It's very heavy, but once it's turned on its fairly easy to move and guide. It's sturdy and looks like it's going to last a long time. No cheap plastic on this. It did a reasonable job of cleaning tile and grout. It's not a miracle worker, but it definitely made the job easier. I'm going to try sone different brush attachments and look for a good cleaner and see if i have better results. One thing i did find that helps is i put the cleaning solution in a garden pressure sprayer thing, to evenly coat the floor before going over it with the scrubber
customer_reviews.author: Selina Mularz

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a well built machine
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well built machine. I used it for cleaning and for removing the Verathane floor finish off the solid wood floors. Worked great. The price was equivalent to what I would have paid to rent a machine for the time I needed it. Now I have a patio to scrub, rugs to scrub and I anticipate getting plenty done with this. Very easy to handle and has a nice long cord.
customer_reviews.author: johnrj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine just quit working? I did not have this machine a full two months and it got hot and quit working only used it 4 times. Now I can't return it what a bad deal this is. Will be contacting Oreck very soon but Amazon should know this is a very bad deal! I paid 0ver 300 for this machine it should have lasted a long time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: terrys smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor cleaner for all floors
customer_reviews.text: Okay this is by far the best floor cleaner I have ever owned. Clean tile, hardwoods, stained concrete, and carpet. This is a professional cleaning machine. It is heavy but my 100 lb wife can handle it. The cord is extra long so you can maneuver all around. You need to purchase the scrub brush and get a few bonnets. For tile put cleaner on your floor use scrub brush to get into the grout lines and pull up all the dirt then use the bonnet to clean up and polish. On my hardwoods I use hardwood floor cleaner and the bonnet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Very upset. Delivered with the handle snapped off. Now I have to send it back and wait for another one. This cost me a large job. Not pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No brushes or pads included!!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing tons of research, I decided to buy the Oreck XL multi purpose floor machine. I have travertine tile throughout my home. I have ye to use it bc it didn’t include any pads or scrubbing brushes. Nowhere in your description does it state that brushes are an extra purchase. I have no idea what brush to use bc it wasn’t explained in the info provided. Now I sit and wait for a brush to be delivered and I have no idea if I purchased the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy P.

customer_reviews.title: A rugged, reliable, easy to use floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use my Oreck floor cleaner to clean the painted floor in my garage. In past summers I've tried to clean off a winter's worth of grime by hand with soap, a coarse brush, and a pressure washer. It worked, but never removed all the stains. With the weight, power, and balance of this machine I finally got the results I wanted with much less effort. My only complaint was the price. At over $300 I hope it lasts for many, many summers.
customer_reviews.author: RDKar

customer_reviews.title: Does an amazing job on tile grout
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous machine, heavy, powerful, fast. Surpassed all expectations. Does an amazing job on tile grout. More than paid for itself right away, we had been paying more than the cost of the machine to have the pros clean the kitchen tile. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning machine!
customer_reviews.text: We had porcelain tile floors laid in our home, but unfortunately, the guys did not leave the floors clean. There was a thick layer of grout all over the floors. At first, we scrubbed on our hands and knees, but it left our fingers so sore, so we decided to buy this machine. You can buy various pads or brushes to fit the unit to get the level of scrubbing you need. You can even buy a lambswool bonnet to buff your floors to a pretty shine before you entertain guests. We also use it on our Trex deck outdoors. Love it and it has a fairly small footprint so it stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieB

customer_reviews.title: It failed after 2 1/2 years (March 2018 to August 2020)
customer_reviews.text: My Oreck ORB550MC failed atfer 2 1/2 years use. I would guess I have used it less than 6 times. The motor won't start unless you raise it above the floor and hold it. It is the starter relay 0-5315701. Oreck informed me that there is only a 1 year warranty on the Machine. Contacted Oreck dealer and he ordered the necessary part.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: I wish this machine would come as a man
customer_reviews.text: I finally ordered the Oreck Commercial floor machine.I have used it on my wood and tile floors this week.I was shocked on how beautiful my wood floors are now.I had used a mop before and they never looked that great.It was as if I got new wood floors installed.As for the tile it was embarrassing to think before the Oreck that I never noticed the color of my tile.I thought they were more of a dark brown until I used this machine and realized they are beige! This is my dream for a floor cleaner -really!!. The only way this machine could possibly get better if I could watch it clean from my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how great the reviews are for this compared to my experience. I've always had good luck with products that had positive reviews. This thing worked great for about 2 minutes until I shut it off. After I tried to restart it and the motor would just hum. I lifted the machine up and turned it on, the motor would slowly start spinning then work fine. So I decided to try and finish the floor I was cleaning, the machine started smoking with another 10 minutes of use. I am hoping I got a lemon and have requested Amazon send me a replacement. I will update my review after using the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 3,500 square feet or kess homeowner
customer_reviews.text: Roughly 70% of our 3,500 square foot home is either wood or tile flooring. In addition to the interior is an extended walkway, patio, double drive way...all requiring yearly deep cleaning. The Oreck Orbiter is exactly what the home care doctor ordered. Just finished our wood floors which now SHINE, beautiful. Sturdy machine, 10 year warranty, one free tune up a year. At $350 for this machine, a steal of a deal. That said, in order to cover the gamut from wood floors to tile to carpet to cement garage floors to driveways, anticipate an additional $300-$400 in brushes and cleaning products. The initial investment in both the Oreck Orbiter will cover a homeowner for 3-4, easily.
customer_reviews.author: Manbyk

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who cleans needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing product I have ever had for cleaning my house. I used it with the carpet cleaning pad and the "dry" carpet cleaner on a stain I have tried for more than two years to get out of my carpet. After one cleaning, the spot was GONE. Completely gone. I have now cleaned all of the carpets in the house and they look new again. I have also used this machine to strip and wax floors and to clean tile. I can't say enough positive things about it. It is easy so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat1983

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in August and it stopped working after 2 uses.. I ordered another replacement in September and used it 3times and it’s no longer working.
customer_reviews.author: erick unzueta

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find it was more quiet than I expected, and I love that about it. It is very easy to operate, and you can handle it with one hand if you have to. I would give it 5 stars, except that the brush attachment has brushes only on the outer circle. When cleaning grout, you have to make sure the brushes are over the grout. I wonder why the entire brush attachment cannot be covered with brushes for faster and more efficient cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Tile Floors!
customer_reviews.text: We live at the beach and one of the things you get acclimated to when you live here is sand. Lots and lots of sand! Even after you vacuum or sweep up the sand, there is debris left over. You can mop or steam clean the floors and then immediately walk upon them with bare feet and the bottom of your feet will turn gray. After using my Oreck Orbital Floor Cleaner, the crimped polypropylene scrubber, the carpet bonnet and some soft scrub and water, the floors look brand new! The grout color is back to its original shade and after walking barefoot my feet are still clean!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Berube

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself with saving time the first time!
customer_reviews.text: This floor scrubber, polisher is the best ever. It isn't the lightest thing but when its running, it glides across our wooden floors with the ease of a ballerina. We use one pad to apply paste wax and a buffing pad to shine our wood floors. Can wax and buff the whole house in a couple of hours. If you have wooden floors and like to keep them waxed, save your money from the cheaper models, get this Oreck, you wont be disappointed. Keep in mind, this does not ship with any pads, you must purchase them separately. It would have been nice if it came with a sample selection.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Holzer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is fabulous! It’s very heavy to move where you want it but once you turn it on it’s a dream to use. Does a fantastic job. Used it to wax all my hardwood floors as well as clean all my tile floors. I was very concerned when I got it because the whole box was open. The ups man brought it in in pieces. The box fell apart. It worked really well but I guess it really was an open box literally
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Useless now!!
customer_reviews.text: Useless now, start overheating after one year of slightly use. It could be great if lasted forever lol.
customer_reviews.author: maria carolyn cagat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase this orbiter due to the price. However, I'm very glad I decided to purchase this. I bought the blue scrubber to attach to this orbiter for cleaning the dirty grout in between my tiles. I was shocked that the grout looks like new again. Another reviewer mentioned using "Resolve" on the grout prior to cleaning. Excellent advice. We sprayed the Resolve, let it sit 30 minutes then followed up with floor cleaner and this machine. We couldn't be happier. We had 1500 sq ft of tile to take care of. Easy DIY effort vs what the cleaning companies charge.
customer_reviews.author: caribella

customer_reviews.title: Meh - it’s okay
customer_reviews.text: We refinished 18yo travertine “honed and polished” stone with ours. It’s “okay”. We also have a Porter Cable XP 7424 car polisher and compared the two. The Porter Cable was miles better - easily twice as good - but had half the coverage (6 vs 12 inch pad) - but this was deemed “I mean... I guess it will be good enough. I don’t want to spend twice as long with the Porter” so we did not return it. Not great. Slow which is not a good thing for a buffer/polisher. Used with: black, brown, green, red, white pads and the lambs wool buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It's a Keeper! 3600+ Square Feet and counting...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This buffer is a real workhorse. I used it to apply oil and buff about 900 square feet of hardwood flooring. Applied with red buffing pads, polished and buffed with the white pads. I made multiple passes and spot touch ups so this machine has seen more 3600 square feet of use. No issues. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: GrooV67

customer_reviews.title: You know it's good when your parents still own one
customer_reviews.text: My father has owned one for over 20 years and swears by it so I bought one for my home when I moved out. Best purchase one could make. No more on my hands and knees scrubbing the floor. This machine leaves the floor absolutely spotless and perfect. You can feel the heavy duty in the materials and construction. Thank you guys for building such an amazing high quality product made in the USA. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Using this currently to try to bring marble floors back to life. Be aware that no polish or scrub pads are included. I’m still experimenting with different colored pads and having some success stripping old sealer/wax from the marble. The machine is heavy enough to exert pad pressure but easy to maneuver when running. It’s a heavy machine to lift and carry but I’m happy with the performance. My marble tile grout lines are much cleaner and the price of the machine will be well worth it when I finish compared to the $4600 quoted to clean and polish my floors by a commercial company.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended, works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Oreck to use on my laminate floors. I have tried many cleaners to remove the wax buildup and dirt, but have had very little success. I decided to try cleaning and buffing. I watched a ton of “How To” videos and researched machines. I am highly pleased with my Oreck. It is time consuming, (you can’t rush) but it is amazing the junk that came off my floors. It looks Great! It not only cleaned but removed all scuff marks and light-med scratches. I can’t wait to try it on my tile floors. I highly recommend this Oreck!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mcclure

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a pro!  UPDATE 9/6/2020 STILL WORKS WONDERFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works and works really well! Still getting the hang of it and what pad to use when, what cleaning product works the best but really glad I purchased it and made the investment. So far I was most pleased using it on some really, really, dirty tile. In my sun room I have several dogs so....... I had every kind of dirt there might be. Tiles are rough and with light grout. While still not perfect boy, as close as you might think you could get. Wish I would have taken photos. Absolutely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Very effective cleaning...
customer_reviews.text: I carried this bad boy in the house and held it up so all the dirt in my laminate floors could see it. The dirt all just got scared and ran out of the house. I didn't even need to fire it up. Also, I just keep it by the kitchen door in from the garage. Dirt starts in, but then it sees the ass-kicker and heads right back out. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Don MarcosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is one fantastic machine. We used it on carpet
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this and I have to say the majority of the reviewers are right. This is one fantastic machine. We used it on carpet, wood floors and tile. We noticed an immediate improvement for all types of floors. It is expensive but worth it as you will spend more renting machines or hiring out people to do this. The machine is heavy but once it turns on it goes very easily over all floor types. Oreck is known for quality and it has rightly earned that reputation. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!...I use the Oreck to clean my 11 year old carpet. I purchased the unit after watching 2 gentleman use the device on YouTube. I sprayed cleaning solution and cleaned with the carpet brush...then...used the bonnet. I wished I knew of this method years ago. I wasted a lot of money on machines that sprayed and sucked water. I am really amazed how it cleaned the traffic area (removed seriously embedded dirt) and lifted the nap of the carpet. This orbiter gets an A+ and it was effortless carpet cleaning with results.
customer_reviews.author: Lworld

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for every household
customer_reviews.text: First off, I've used this machine to clean - in a week - tile, bath tub, granite countertops and years of stains in carpet (stairs). The machine is easy to maneuver. I'm so far using the black brush and the bonnet. I only wish I had had my Oreck since my twenties. Not much effort and everything feels and looks clean and polished. The stairs took about an hour. I used Resolve for the stains. Stairs look amazing now. The tile grout has very few remaining stains which I will continue to work on. ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: MariV

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to restore life to my tile floors. Using the green bristled pad seems to be the best. After using the green, I switch to the lambs wool for a final cleaning. I also installed some new, high gloss tile. I decided to use the oreck to help clean the floor and the results were perfect. For cleaning grout, put the cleaner directly on the grout. A typical floor cleaner for should be used for the tile. I used a dry sniffer to clean up the residue before it dried.
customer_reviews.author: scott steward

customer_reviews.title: Well built & great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean a smooth concrete basement floor that had mud embedded in it. Reasonably priced but high quality. Worked great, the orange brush for concrete didn’t do a great job and was hard to get it to stay centered and the machine skipped a bit. Tried the green scrub pad style instead and they worked fantastic. For a homeowner it is perfect, slightly smaller head than a commercial unit at only 10” but for limited use it is fine. Build quality is strong, you can tell it is heavy duty but at a great price. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Oreck and I'm extremely thankful I did. It's light to carry I can operate it with one hand which is a major plus and it came brand new with black disc to attach pads. I ordered all the other accessories didn't come for different flooring which was very affordable. I'm a female owned and operated cleaning/carpet service and I'm glad I made the purchase very easy just click the bottom and go.
customer_reviews.author: Interstar Cleaning Services

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy.
customer_reviews.text: Smart buy. No more struggling with vinyl floors. No more kneeling, scraping, and scrubbing. It's a powerful machine that doesn't cost hundreds of dollars. Easy to operate. Love the long power cord. Get the right pads for the job and have an extra or two. Watch a video or two on how to do an efficient job. Get a rolling bucket with a mop wringer. Line the bucket with heavy plastic bags. It's a lot of work but it's not rocket science. This Oreck will make the job much easier than you realize. The results will impress.
customer_reviews.author: Red Onorato

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We have vct floors in our kitchen. Used to have to pay for professional stripping, waxing and buffing. Purchased the Oreck in 2017 and it has worked amazing ever since. I agree with others that it is worth doing the research on the right pad and cleaner for your job. Also, stores flat if you are tight on closet storage for cleaning supples!
customer_reviews.author: The Day’s

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works about 90%of the time. You just have to pass over it several times. I wish they can be more descriptive of which attachment does what. I bought practically all of it in hopes of getting the right product. Basically, get the carpet pad cloth attachment which covers most of your needs. If you need the brush, try the green, then red for something harder. But more videos on YouTube note green for slightly softer bristles to get into the grout. Everything else is pretty much needless. Maybe the wool if you want to polish something with really soft thing, but overall the carpet pad will do for most homes. Wish I knew before spending all that money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money!
customer_reviews.text: My entire foyer, kitchen and bathrooms are off-white tile and so after calling several local floor cleaning services and getting estimates of from $700 to over $1,000 I decided to buy this orbiter and do it myself. I've only done the kitchen and bathrooms but it's already saved me quite a bit of money and it's a joy to use. It's heavy but you don't notice the weight as it glides effortlessly around the floor leaving spotless tile behind. Then a hit with the polishing pad and it's once again like new.
customer_reviews.author: old arkiedan

customer_reviews.title: A REAL machine! Powerful, manueverable, well built, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it on Amazon Day for $288, as opposed to buying one of those plastic toys with tiny scrubbing heads. It does a fast, thorough job on a textured porcelain floor. Different heads are available, I'm going to try refinishing a bamboo floor. Not as heavy duty as a large rental unit but it's a real scrubbing machine. 2 THUMBS UP!
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: For normal jobs that size of the rotary doesn’t matter too much this is way better to lug up and down steps
customer_reviews.text: As a professional cleaner, many will try to tell you these aren’t worth buying. For normal jobs that size of the rotary doesn’t matter too much this is way better to lug up and down steps. If buffing or using night after night commercially on big jobs I can totally see this not being used as a valuble tool. But for residential homes I tend to use them in its great!
customer_reviews.author: Average-Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Great product.I was tempted by lower cost floor cleaners snice this will be used in my house. But I decided I didn't want to gamble on cheap. This is a wonderfu l machine. Easy to handle when on. It is heavy to move, but that weight is good for the scrubbng. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G. Heatherington

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a BEAST in a good way...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to deep clean our entryway tiles/grout as the steam mop was just not cutting it and after a couple passes this thing powered thru several layers to reveal a whole new color floor... very pleased with the performance! Tried a couple different bushes and pads, the slightly softer brush worked best as it seemed to get down into our grout more than the stiffer brush. Machine is heavy but not hard to maneuver when on. Now only need to run this once in a while for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Ktay

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. I use it only for a scrubber. Used it with simple green on my polycarbonate garage floor, kitchen and bathroom tile floors, laundry room and concrete stained lanai. All came out cleaner than new. I could toss this machine today, but I will not, because it has already paid for itself. The only one at this price heavy enough to do a good job. Others are toys unless you pay near 2 grand. Oh, I also used it on my shower floor. Fantastic...
customer_reviews.author: Villager

customer_reviews.title: Not as it was adveertised
customer_reviews.text: I got this item to clean tile grouts in between tiles. After applying the chemical on the surface and use this with 5 times result was disappointing. I mean I cannot see a significant difference. If you are looking for a decent result, this not the product that you should be buying.
customer_reviews.author: bisonburger

customer_reviews.title: Deep cleans even in my busy restaurant
customer_reviews.text: I use this scrubber for my restaurant and it’s amazing how clean it gets the floors. It seems to lift up grease with ease even in our busy kitchen. I used to scrub the floors with a manual floor scrubbed and I don’t know why I didn’t invest in this machine before. If you’re in the fence about it I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: elbandido

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Grade Scrubber
customer_reviews.text: A commercial-grade floor scrubber- cast iron housing, tons of power, really REALLY long cord. Not a plastic-y consumer machine. Surprisingly easy to maneuver. You will like this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Steele

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated....
customer_reviews.text: The Oreck Commercial Orbiter Floor Machine is GREAT. It works as advertised and is perfect for household use. I have stairs to climb so I was looking for a machine that is not too heavy but performs as if it were, and can be stored easily. The Oreck is just that and I am delighted. It more than meets my expectations and a wide variety of brushes and buffing pads are available. I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKingCFI

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love my orbiter! I own a cleaning company, and this machine is so versatile. I've used it to scrub tile floors that were gunky and greasy. I've used it to buff hardwood floors. I've used it in the process of carpet cleaning. I do find it a little heavy to pick up and move, but once it's running it's super easy to move and use. Compared to larger machines, this is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works awesome for cleaning tile and grout
customer_reviews.text: This works awesome for cleaning tile and grout. Before I had this I would be on the floor scrubbing with a bucket and brush. We have 4 big dogs, so this is a life saver when they track in mud on a rainy day. The brush attachments come separately, so do not forget to place an order for those. I use the green and the orange 12" for our floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla/Jason

customer_reviews.title: Oreck Orbiter Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of this machine. It pretty much runs itself. All I have to do is guide it in the direction I want. My only problem is likely of my own making. I'm not sure I used the right pads for cleaning and for polishing. I have tile but it appears the machine did not get into the "cracks and crevacies". My wood floors look amazing. I received tons of compliments on both floors. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: their mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality and simple to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to clean 5 very big rooms. It scrubbed the floors very well. It is equivalent to five guys scrubbing the floors on their knees all day long. Even if it would fail, it was worth the money. The machine is very good quality, and very easy. I am glad i purchased it. I purchased the orange and the green brush. The greens was a little softer. I prefered the orange brush for my filthy floors. The unit is very easy to meanuver
customer_reviews.author: Teufic H

customer_reviews.title: wow wow this works incredibly well
customer_reviews.text: Just completed cleaning around 1700 sq foot of tile (which hasn't been cleaned in 3 years). I can tell you that this is worth every penny. I didn't have any issues with the floor machine and it was worth buying it ! It is very easy to control and has a very long extension cord. All i did was to mix some soft scrub with water and dump it on the floor and let the floor machine do its job !
customer_reviews.author: desert rat

customer_reviews.title: mixed review
customer_reviews.text: The rating is not correct as it was too heavy for me to use. So more than likely did do a good job cleaning, but moving for an 82 yo was difficult to I returned it. Learned a lesson buy for keeps if Amazon but be careful if not an amazon product. Horrible to send back
customer_reviews.author: C M Straub

customer_reviews.title: Great buffer for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional quality buffer that is great for polishing it tight spaces. Very sturdy and heavy duty. Love it. Worked very nicely on my wood floors. Don't forget to buy the polishing or cleaning pads which are sold separately. Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Big

customer_reviews.title: Motor burn out
customer_reviews.text: I loved this thing until the motor burned out after a year very light use.
customer_reviews.author: jane tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor machine
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever used a professional buffer/scrubber, this will be a one-handed joy to use. It's quiet, and with the right brush, it will do what you need. I used the green brush with powdered spic and Span on my tile and grout with great results. It doesn't throw the water around if you are careful. Of course, I do not know about its longevity, but I have my fingers crossed. I also bought the orange brush, but felt it was too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Floors!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks, actually it rotates and osvikTes with s counter balance to effortlessly (yes it weighs a ton!) but it glides super-easy on our wood floors! Buffs wood and stone to a high shine and delivers excellent results time after time. High quality construction, almost commercial grade quality that is built to last! Buy with confidence this cleaner's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: SoCal AC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Its no wonder that it looks like the design hasn't changed since the 50's, because its perfect. We used it to clean our floor tile and grout and got it clean. Ordered all three of the brushes and was amazed how quickly and effortlessly it cleans. The rotation of the brush combined with the heavy weight of the machine does all the work. No need for specialty cleaning solutions either, I just used Mr. Clean! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Norb from Houston

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: None of the above ratings actually apply. It is very disappointing to receive a machine which is totally unusable upon arrival. I was not aware that the accessories need to be purchased separately. Why sell a machine useless without them???? Not even one was included with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Cleans tile like a professional service
customer_reviews.text: I paid more than this cost for professional tile cleaning less than a year ago. With this machine and just a few hours I had my floors back to looking like they did then. Mopping only does so much for a textured tile, especially in a kitchen, and scrubbing on my hands and knees is very time-consuming. Wish I'd bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped it would be!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine! So easy to maneuver! I wouldn't call it "light weight" because it is fairly heavy, but that's absolutely necessary for it to work well. It clean really well on all surfaces. You DO have to buy the pads separately and I wish they would make it easier to figure out what works with it, but I did finally -- I have the blue brush and the pink scrubbing pads and they work great! I do need a buffing pad of some sort -- will track that down eventually. My only regret is I waited so long to order it! GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn Mobley

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME MACHINE!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this floor machine to get dark spots out of the pits in my tile floor. I had spent hours on my hands and knees using Soft Scrub and a stiff bristle brush to clean these pits in just my kitchen area. So, when I read other reviews about the Oreck Commercial Orbiter Floor Machine, I decided to give it a try. When I tried using the black brush, it did not remove the dirt/stains from the pitted areas. However, when I used the orange brush, it did an amazing job of cleaning those pitted area in my tile!!! I am so excited about this product. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This machine was worth every single penny! I have alot of white tile floor with light colored grout. The grout looked black before I used this machine. 4 large dogs and 5 people running through my large kitchen all day long. This made my entire life to be able to clean those filthy grout lines with such ease. I used the orange brush attachment. It is really quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done tile and hardwood cleaning with the machine. It does work great, is lightweight,easy to control and quiet. It would cost more to have half of my floors cleaned by someone than the cost of the orbiter. Easy enough to be used by anyone.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Scrubber!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 18" tile with light grout through my entire downstairs. I have scrubbed the tile and grout on my hands and knees for the last 13 years. I purchased a dinky cleaner maybe 5 years ago that was almost pointless for cleaning the grout. I finally decided that I have had enough and purchased this scrubber after reading 100s of reviews. It arrived in record time and I used it for the first time yesterday. Probably one of my best purchases ever! It is very easy to use, heavy enough to really put weight into the scrubbing but still very user friendly. Save your knees and invest in one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Altshuler

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD, BUT WITH CONS
customer_reviews.text: No doubt this machine is perfect to clean flooring surfaces, but not perfect for grout. The reason is that the brush is round and flat, hence, it does not get into the grout. I had to tilt it to either right or left the whole time to target the grout, and that's very tiring considering the weight of this machine. It this machine came with a brush specifically for grout, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ScamReport

customer_reviews.title: Great to clean tile floors and grout
customer_reviews.text: Makes the job much easier to clean floor tile and grout. Even though the unit has some heft to it, very solid/well made by the way, once it's turned on, it floats above the tile and very easy to maneuver and clean around the floor. We bought the scrub orbiter brush for the tile/grout cleaning and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: SKeys

product_meta.title: Oreck Commercial ORB550MC Commercial Orbiter Floor Machine
product_meta.description: Color:SilverFLOOR BUFFER for cleaning wood, vinyl, tile, and other hard floors and for dry-cleaning and loosening dirt from carpeted floors CLEAN FLOORS - Whether you need to polish hard floors or deep clean carpets, our versatile products offer everything you need to get the job done without hiring outside help 13" CLEANING PATH and 50-foot power cord SUITABLE FOR use with brushes, pads, bonnets, shampoos, and cleaning solutions (sold separately)
feature_bullets: FLOOR BUFFER for cleaning wood, vinyl, tile, and other hard floors and for dry-cleaning and loosening dirt from carpeted floors.
CLEAN FLOORS - Whether you need to polish hard floors or deep clean carpets, our versatile products offer everything you need to get the job done without hiring outside help.
SUITABLE FOR use with brushes, pads, bonnets, shampoos, and cleaning solutions (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,387 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
